overview: Hot newcomer Greg Ross is a gay cop with a problem: His "straight" partners like to take advantage of the young guys they pull over on their beat. Greg takes the matter to his Captain, only to end up in a three way with his partner and his superior. Faced with the hypocrisy and the rampant sexuality of the department. Greg must choose between his ambitions and his emotions.
tagline: Good cop. Bad cop. Take your pick.
title: Total Corruption
